Text: Seeding in Europe again on a fast connection...

SWEET - Thanks GREAT Movie, but i had to change the extension to AVI to play it..
thanks again for the up

or those who think they can't play a .divx file, just do one of these many "solutions":

- change the extension to .avi like david1946 did
- right-click and select "open with" whatever program you usually use to play videos
- associate the .divx extension to the program you use so that in the future, you directly open them with that program...
- Download the DivX player.
- Ultimately use VLC because it will play virtually _anything_ from mp3 to Quicktime, with FLV and ASF in between and even iso files and EVEN recognize a DVD folder... this is hard to beat!

Simple codec... it'll take you about .00001% of the time it takes to download the movie to get it....but whatever your pleasure...

It's worth noting that this is an ENGLISH version, swimming amongst a bunch of Swedish files.

Damn Swedes.
